name: Salmon a Tuna
description:
Modern online game for young and bold. Love and hate, friendship and betrayal, fear and overcoming. Everything is in the exciting project Salmon a Tuna.

ABILITIES:

* Ability to salmon a tuna!
* To move left and right
* To move up and down
* To move up left and right down
* Ability to not salmon a tuna!

Purpose of the game: To salmon a tuna before he salmoned you.

How to: Up, down, left and right buttons as well as w, a, s, d to move. Space or Enter button to SALMON! Chase the tuna and salmon him as hard as you can!

CREDITS:

Yaroslav Bezruchko, Alexander Karpenko, Nadezhda Sapunova.

Sounds: freesound.org

Music: Edvard Grieg, Johann Sebastian Bach, Ludwig van Beethoven, Carl Orff.
